title: [求助]RPGitem无法正常运行
author: 丿吾乃丶神
txt_content:
无法读取items
每次重启一次服务器，就备份一次items
报告为：
RPGItems (4.09) Error loading /home/minecraft/multicraft/servers/server1130/plugins/RPG_Items/items/items.yml
java.lang.NullPointerException
at net.minecraft.item.ItemStack.func_77960_j(ItemStack.java:243)
at net.minecraft.item.crafting.ShapedRecipes.toBukkitRecipe(ShapedRecipes.java:91)
at net.minecraft.item.crafting.ShapedRecipes.toBukkitRecipe(ShapedRecipes.java:13)
at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R4.inventory.RecipeIterator.next(RecipeIterator.java:32)
at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R4.inventory.RecipeIterator.next(RecipeIterator.java:10)
at think.rpgitems.item.RPGItem.a(RPGItem.java:376)
at think.rpgitems.item.RPGItem.a(RPGItem.java:489)
at think.rpgitems.item.RPGItem.(RPGItem.java:292)
at yo.by.a(ItemManager.java:67)
at yo.by.a(ItemManager.java:48)
at think.rpgitems.Plugin.onEnable(Plugin.java:101)
at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin.setEnabled(JavaPlugin.java:316)
at org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPluginLoader.enablePlugin(JavaPluginLoader.java:368)
at org.bukkit.plugin.SimplePluginManager.enablePlugin(SimplePluginManager.java:410)
at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R4.CraftServer.loadPlugin(CraftServer.java:415)
at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_7_R4.CraftServer.enablePlugins(CraftServer.java:349)
at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71243_i(MinecraftServer.java:511)
at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71222_d(MinecraftServer.java:485)
at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71247_a(MinecraftServer.java:445)
at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71197_b(DedicatedServer.java:336)
at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:631)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:745)重装插件，更换插件版本后，不生成items文件，在游戏里无法创建物品例如/rpgitem 1 create 啥都不显示输入/rpgitem list 啥都没有

replies.author: egg_apple
replies.txt_content: 额- -这个item不因该到服务器或者mod区问嘛？
